meanings.sent1: The impregnablenesses of the fortress made it impossible for the enemy to breach.

meanings.definition: The ability to resist attack or penetration.
meanings.sent1: The impregnablenesses of the armor saved the knight from the enemy's sword.
meanings.sent2: The impregnablenesses of the material made it ideal for military use.
